comments:
The fact that runtime is no longer a real plugin causes some griefs to some 
plugins that were used to get the plugin object and then access preferences. 
One example of such a problem occurs to the CVS UI.

I tried the N20031207 nightly build and got the following exception when trying 
to update a file with CVS Synchronixe View:

Is this exception related to this defect?

This has been fixed by reorganizing Plugin to implement BundleActivator and 
some other fixes. Sorry can not find the other PR talking about it.
